scripts.bootstrap: npm install && concurrently "cd blockchain && npm install" "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.bootstrap:ci: npm ci && concurrently "cd blockchain && npm ci" "cd server && npm ci" "cd client && npm ci"
scripts.build: npm run compile --prefix blockchain && npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.build:prod: npm run compile --prefix blockchain && npm run publish --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
